function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Promote and distribute data sharing of non-clinical trial data","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict reproducibility and transparency standards in clinical research","category":"Independent verification and validation of research findings, strict peer review processes","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear and transparent communication of research findings, public education efforts","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establishing standardized research protocols, independent verification and validation","category":"Independent verification and validation of research findings, strict peer review processes","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement regular audits, enforce data sharing, and set clear timeframes for data transfer","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Develop standardized and accessible data formats, provide resources for data sharing, incentivize research groups","category":"Raising
